results.title: Metformin inhibits salivary adenocarcinoma growth through cell cycle arrest and apoptosis.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ inhibitory effects were enhanced by @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ inhibitor suggesting that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ inhibitor utilize distinctive signaling pathways to suppress @<m>DISEASE_Adenoma_Pleomorphic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008949 @@@salivary tumor@@@ growth.
